comment: Thanks to this professor I will be repeating senior design 1 and delaying my graduation. Thanks KSU

I'm riding it out and hoping for a curve but KSU really needs to fire this professor. He is comically bad at being a professor. Practically blames students for his exams that are essentially just deriving equations and proofs.

This professor sent an email out 6 minutes before the withdrawal period ended telling us we did not do well on a SINGLE problem that is worth 10% of your grade. You mess up 1 problem and you're dropping a letter grade. Ridiculous.
Class average is failing. This professor seems to think it's the student's fault.
I would rather drink my dog's dirty bath water than take another class with this professor. Hands down the worst professor I've ever had.

He makes thing way more complicated than they should be and that 2nd test was unfair. Avoid this professor at all cost. Also I noticed that this professor has 2 entries in ratemyprofessor but someone misspelled his name. Nononil Sen is the misspelled one and has these reviews, while Novonil Sen at the time of this post has no reviews.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Why is he even a professor? So bad.
Worst professor I've ever had. Lots of ungodly hard homework. Exams are stupidly hard. Seems like he doesn't actually want to be here teaching

Worst professor at KSU. How do you barely touch solidworks in a solidworks based class. We never learned how to do solidworks simulations and were forced to know matlab except he just expected everyone to be masters even though its not a prereq. I dropped his class and just delayed it by a semester to take sooklal and its 1000% better. Avoid him
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Worst experience of my life. 0/10 would not recommend. Last day of class he went on a rant about the class being too easy, class average is failing
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Bad. The class average is an F. Do not take.
Class average is failing every assignment. Homework makes no sense and is extremely long. I have not learned  a single thing in this class.
